name: EmojiEverywhere
author: pali (pali#0439)
short: Keeps track of used emoji and lets people use them using a slash command.
description: Keeps track of used emoji and lets people use them using a slash command.
install_msg: The slash commands may take a while to appear. If you want to be able to use deleted emoji you'll need to create a guild and assign it as a storage guild for temporary emoji using ]set_emoji_guild. You can also do ]set_emoji_log to set a channel to log emoji added / removed in that guild.
